com.novartis.opensource.yada

Class ConnectionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.novartis.opensource.yada.ConnectionFactory

  • public class ConnectionFactory
extends Object
    Provides for the creation and disposal of JDBC and SOAP connection objects configured using jndi.
    Since:
    0.1.0.0
    Author:
    David Varon

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      private static Map<Connection,String> connectionMap
      Map of Connection to JNDI String to facilitate better logging

      Local logger handle

    • Method Detail

      • getSOAPConnection

        public static SOAPConnection getSOAPConnection()
                                        throws YADAConnectionException
        Creates a generic SOAP connection object to use for communication with an endpoint.
        Returns:
        a SOAPConnection object on which to submit a request
        Throws:
        YADAConnectionException - when unable to obtain a connection

      • getConnection

        public static Connection getConnection(String source)
                                throws YADAConnectionException
        Returns a JDBC connection from the datasource identified by source.
        Parameters:
        source - the JNDI name of the datasource
        Returns:
        Connection object to facilitate query execution
        Throws:
        YADAConnectionException - when the JNDI source is unrecognized or the database to which it refers is unreachable

      • getCacheConnection

        public static net.sf.ehcache.Cache getCacheConnection(String cacheManager,
                                      String cache)
        Retrievs the in-memory cache used to store requested YADAQuery objects.
        Parameters:
        cacheManager - the name of the cache manager, (YADAIndexManager)
        cache - the name of the desired cache (YADAIndex
        Returns:
        Cache object
        Since:
        0.4.1.0

      • releaseResources

        public static void releaseResources(ResultSet rs)
                             throws YADAConnectionException
        Retrieves the Statement from the ResultSet, closes the ResultSet, and then cascades to close the Statement (which in turn will cascade to close its Connection). IF the Statement can't be acquired, an attempt is still made to close the ResultSet
        Parameters:
        rs - the ResultSet recently iterated
        Throws:
        YADAConnectionException - when rs can't be closed
        See Also:
        releaseResources(Statement)

      • releaseResources

        public static void releaseResources(Statement stmt)
                             throws YADAConnectionException
        Retrieves the Connection from the Statement parameter, closes the Statement and then cascades to close the Connection. If the Connection can't be acquired, an attempt is still made to close the Statement
        Parameters:
        stmt - the Statement recently executed (PreparedStatement or CallableStatement)
        Throws:
        YADAConnectionException - when stmt can't be closed

      • releaseResources

        public static void releaseResources(Connection conn)
                             throws YADAConnectionException
        Returns the Connection, specified by the parameter, to the connection pool.
        Parameters:
        conn - - The Connection intended to be returned to the pool.
        Throws:
        YADAConnectionException - when conn can't be returned to the pool

      • releaseResources

        public static void releaseResources(SOAPConnection conn,
                    String source)
                             throws YADAConnectionException
        Closes the SOAPConnection
        Parameters:
        conn - the SOAPConnection object to close
        source - the url string pointing to the soap endpoint
        Throws:
        YADAConnectionException - when the connection closing operation fails
